definitions.title: n.f.
definitions.body: foundation, appointment, [[מַטֵּה מוּסָדָה]] Is 30:32 rod of appointment (cf. Hb Hab 1:12 [[יׇסַד]]), appointed rod (of punishment); pl. cstr. [[מוּסְדוֹת]] Ez Eze 41:8 Qr, must mean foundations (si vera 1.); Kt perhaps intends

definitions.title: Pu.
definitions.body: Pt. [[מְיֻסָּדוֹת]] founded, and furnished with foundation (conject. emendation by Co).
